entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 09:52 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:23 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 08:23 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
